page.title: 03My School
page.content: The forty pupils on the school roll are divided into two groups.P1,2,3,4 and P5,6,7.The school day begins with the Lord's prayer.Daily school work covers such subjects as Maths,English Reading and Environmental Studies.In the afternoons on a weekly basis Art, Music,P.E.and Sewing classes are taken sometimes by a specialist.Weekly the local minister conducts a service and a remedial specialist visits.The mobile library van,speech therapist and dental hygienist visit fortnightly Each term the school nurse does a health inspection.Annually there is an eye test and a visit from the school doctor and dentist.The community policeman acts as football coach.The older pupils have swimming classes in Wick and cycling proficiency instruction from the police in the autumn and summer terms respectively.
